skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer - Jenkins, Hull Number DD-447!
skins.selfIntroduction: I-I'm Jenkins, DD-447, one of the earliest Fletcher-class ships built. Truth be told, I'm actually not good at combat at all... I barely helped out at Kula Gulf or Kolombangara... Anyways... That's my story~!
skins.acquisition: Y-you're the commander?... Hello, I'm Jenkins, a Fletcher-class destroyer... U-um, could you take me back with you?
skins.login: D-do remember the secret word? ... P-phew... Then it's really you, Commander...
skins.details: I-is there anything we can do together, Commander...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: There are actually some obvious differences between us Fletcher sisters.
skins.secretaryIdle2: M-my heart beats so quickly... whenever I'm in front of you, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle3: It really is a wonder... that all of us who ended up spread across the world could reunite here...
skins.secretaryTouch: C-Commander, would you like to... um... have lunch together sometime?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander?! U-um, I-I-I don't believe you should be doing this...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, g-good evening...? Right now, I'm bringing presents to Radford and the others...? Could you give me a hand? Th-thank you... Um, your present.. this apple, do you want it?
